news.title: Single window system for building approvals soon in Tamil Nadu
news.para: Tamil Nadu minister for housing said that as per the instructions of the chief minister, required infrastructure facilities are being created so that people can get approval for housing sites and building plans by sitting at the comfort of their houses.

news.title: Two builders associations merge with NAREDCO Maharashtra
news.para: Over 750 combined membership strength of both BDA & CMDWA largely consisting of developers who work under DCR 33-7, 33-5 & 33-9 on cessed and non-cessed buildings including MHADA and estate lease hold lands have come together with NAREDCO.

news.title: Gurugram: Lift and guard room in stilt area may get government nod soon
news.para: Also, the demand to compensate 24% floor area ratio (FAR) of the permitted 264, which gets used up in installing lift and constructing stairs, is awaiting the CM’s final nod.

news.title: Rajasthan HC holds banks accountable under RERA
news.para: The court also held that in event of conflict between the RERA Act and the recovery proceedings of the bank under Securitisation and Reconstruction of Financial Assets and Enforcement of Security Interest (SARFAESI) Act, RERA Act would prevail.

news.title: CAG report fallout: Role of senior officials of Noida authority comes under scrutiny
news.para: Based on the CAG report, which has pointed out large-scale irregularities, collusion to favour realtors, and a failure of governance at all levels, the role of current and past employees in the main wings of the Noida Authority are particularly relevant in this exercise, beginning with the plot allotment committee (PAC).

news.title: Shree Cement to set up Rs 1,500 crore cement plant in Andhra Pradesh
news.para: Shree Cement has cement manufacturing and allied sectors plants in nine states and it will be setting up its first plant in Andhra Pradesh and the plan is prepared to complete the project in 24 months.

news.title: Registration of homes in Mumbai down 18% in November 2021
news.para: The registration of homes stood at 7,582 units in November last year. During January-November 2020, 46,052 homes were registered.

news.title: Chengdu city takes back two plots of land from China Evergrande Group
news.para: The land planning authority in the southwestern city said it was taking control of the plots, totalling over 300,000 square meters, as Evergrande had not developed them after holding them for over a decade.

news.title: UAE central bank to increase oversight of banks' real estate exposure
news.para: The regulator is introducing an "enhanced framework" that will cover all types of on-balance-sheet loans and investments, and off-balance-sheet exposures to the real estate sector, it said in a statement.

news.title: China urges real estate project acquisitions to aid struggling builders: Media
news.para: The People's Bank of China (PBOC) and the China Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission (CBIRC) recently issued a notice to financial institutions, urging them to strengthen financial support for such acquisitions, the newspaper reported.

news.title: Shriram Properties shares tumble over 16% in debut trade
news.para: ​The stock listed at Rs 94, a decline of 20.33 per cent from the issue price on the BSE. During the day, it tumbled 22.24 per cent to Rs 91.75. It settled at Rs 99.40, a discount of 15.76 per cent.

news.title: CAQM lifts curbs on construction work in Delhi-NCR
news.para: ​The panel noted that the air quality index in Delhi has improved from the very poor category and has consistently been in the poor category for the last three days.

news.title: UP-RERA appoints REPL as consultant for stuck projects in Greater Noida
news.para: Rudrabhishek Enterprises (REPL)  will monitor physical & financial progress of Casa Grande 2 of Earthcon Construction, La Palacia of Newtech La Palacial and Unibera Towers of Unibera Developers

news.title: Kolkata: Defunct street lights keep Salt Lake stretches dark
news.para: On a few stretches like the cross road from Anindita bus stop towards Laboni and near Laboni Island on the road leading towards FD block, streetlights have been out of order for quite a few days.

news.title: Rapid urbanisation has left Mohali towns in civic mess
news.para: Mohali, Derabassi and Kharar share issues like illegal and haphazard construction, traffic and parking problem, broken roads, blocked sewerage, poor drainage, and lawlessness.
